tidbits.title: Historical Significance
tidbits.description: Israel holds immense historical significance with religious sites like Jerusalem's Old City, important to Judaism, Christianity, and Islam.

tidbits.title: Innovation Hub
tidbits.description: The country is an innovation hub, known for its advancements in technology, startup culture, and scientific research and development.

tidbits.title: Diverse Landscapes
tidbits.description: Israel features diverse landscapes, from the Dead Sea, the lowest point on Earth, to the Negev Desert and the lush Galilee region.
